mods.abstract: Renfro Valley Breakfast Party program, 1948-05-20 (year unconfirmed, based on related discs), as recorded by WLAC, Nashville, TN. Featuring announcer Ken Meeker, host John Lair, and performers Pee Wee Wade Baker, Bob Simmons, the Davidson Brothers, Jerry Behrens, Lloyd Davidson. Also featuring Roy (last name unknown). Sponsored by Ballard & Ballard, a CBS syndication originating at WHAS, Louisville, KY.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
